title: Condorcet Reflections on Black Slavery Q4

content.question: Which of the following best explains why Condorcet sought to reassure his audience that the action he was proposing would “harm neither commerce nor the wealth of a nation?”

choices.label: Revolutionary movements in Latin America challenged imperial governments.
The Atlantic plantation system generated significant revenue for European economies.
The development of trading-post empires in Asia enriched European merchants.
Proponents of free trade challenged royal monopolies on trade goods.

content.answer: The Atlantic plantation system generated significant revenue for European economies.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
